alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:59AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 8 and 16 inches along the Idaho border with 3 to 7 inches further north. Winds gusting as high 45 mph with gusts to 65 mph over ridgetops. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of gusty winds and falling snow will create significant blowing and drifting snow for locations along interstate 15 from Monida Pass to Lima and across Raynolds and Targhee passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
